importantArticles.headline: The digital payment landscape in Europe is undergoing significant transformation, with projections indicating robust growth through 2028, largely influenced by smartphone penetration, contactless technology, and digital wallets. In 2024, the adoption rate for digital payments surpassed 60% for online transactions and 25% for in-store payments, driven by the popularity of global and OEM digital wallets. Non-cash transactions are forecasted to increase at a compound annual growth rate exceeding...
importantArticles.title: This Week In Digital Payment - Europe's Rising Wave: Transforming Transactions Through 2028
